TopicTitle: Search for the Bop Kraken location. (Spoiler Alert)

Articles.Content:
1st time go to Bop and search for that Kraken "baby". Spend almost half day try to figure out where is that Kraken. After much googeling, finally pin-point that baby squirt and landed on its big head. Possibly, next mission will plant a flag on it.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
cool,well done for landin ON it
